description: Shō is the main character of the soccer manga and anime Whistle!. He is a regular of the Josui High soccer varsity team and plays the position of Forward with Shigeki Satō. For a soccer player, Shō is pretty short at 146 cm (4 ft 9 in), which can be a hindrance, as well as an asset. His jersey number is 9. While not being very good at soccer, Sho has a thirst to improve and never gives up. His determination often inspires the people around him, and is something that even his team captain Mizuno admires. While he`s neither the best nor the leader of his soccer team, he is the heart of it.
name: Kazamatsuri Shou
